action of atomic nucleienergy
Aan atomic nucleus splits into two or more smaller nucleiabsorbed
Ban atomic nucleus splits into two or more smaller nucleireleased
Catomic nuclei join together to form a larger nucleusabsorbed
Datomic nuclei join together to form a larger nucleusreleased
